import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import '../CSS/' class BookingDetails extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { booking:{} }; } componentDidMount(){ const id = this.props.match.params.id; axios.get(`http://localhost:8015/booking/${id}`).then((res)=>{ if(res.data.success){ this.setState({ booking:res.data.booking }); console.log(this.state.booking); } }); } render() { const { CustomerName,CustomerEmail,MobileNumber,TourOption,VisitDate,Time,TourGuideName} =this.state.booking; return (
